Title: relates to fiscal intermediary services
Summary: Ensures that there are at least two fiscal intermediaries headquartered in each county with a population of two hundred thousand or more; provides additional awards to entities providing fiscal intermediary services if they meet certain criteria in order to ensure regional choice and experience serving individuals with developmental disabilities and racial and ethnic minorities.
LawCode: Amd ยง365-f, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to fiscal intermediary services
